DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE : To investigate natural time course patient-reported outcome meniscus surgery identify factor associate good bad outcome surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Knee Arthroscopy Cohort Southern Denmark ( KACS )
DOC.criteria: Assigned arthroscopy suspicion medial and/or lateral meniscus tear . Age > 18 year time recruitment Having email address Able read understand Danish Patients previously undergone surgical reconstruction anterior posterior cruciate ligament ( ACL PCL ) either knee Fracture low extremity ( i.e . hip , leg foot ) either leg within last 6 month prior recruitment Not mentally able reply questionnaire
